sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function Weathercard({tempInfo}) { const { temp, humidity, pressure, weatherMood, name, speed, country, sunset } = tempInfo; return ( <>
{temp}°
{weatherMood}
{name}, {country}
{new Date().toLocaleString() }

19:19 PM
Sunset

19:19 PM
Humidity

19:19 PM
Pressure

19:19 PM
Wind

) } export default Weathercard
